data.event: His lawyer on Sunday announced his death.
He was arrested on June 27 near his parents' Algiers home after writing a poem on Facebook.
On June 11 he was fined 200,000 dinars (£1,400; US$1,800) and imprisoned for two years.

Tamalt fell into a coma which his lawyer, Amine Sidhoum, said lasted three months.
